title: Sweet and spicy Mexican biscuits
ingredients: ['80 to 100g caster sugar', '110g butter or margarine, softened', '1 egg', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '150g plain flour', '60g hot chocolate mix or cocoa powder', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon chilli powder or cayenne pepper']
